items.title: Investment Analysis & Portfolio Management - Core Finance

visible_instructors.title: Fervent #LearnWithDistinction
visible_instructors.job_title: Rigorous courses, backed by research, taught with simplicity
visible_instructors.name: Fervent

items.headline: Financial Analysis Done Right - Rigorously Analyse Investments & Manage Portfolios using Excel® & Google Sheets
objectives_summary: Calculate stock returns manually as well as on Excel and Google Sheets, using real world data obtained from free sources.
Estimate the Expected Returns of Stocks using the Mean Method, State Contingent Weighted Probabilities, as well as Asset Pricing Models.
Calculate the total risk, market risk, and firm specific risk of stocks from scratch, and explore how the different risks interact.

items.title: Financial Analysis and Financial Modeling using MS Excel
items.headline: Perform financial analysis & financial modeling using Microsoft excel. For people who want to become a Financial Analyst
objectives_summary: Use MS Excel to create and automate the calculation of Financial ratios
Become proficient in Excel data tools like Sorting, Filtering, Data validations, and Data importing
Implement predictive ML models such as simple and multiple linear regression to predict outcomes to real world Finance problems
